articles.author: Danielle Wallace
articles.title: Coronavirus evacuees to be housed at California, Texas and Colorado military bases
articles.description: Four U.S. military bases in California, Colorado and Texas were selected Saturday to house up to 1,000 Americans expected to be placed under quarantine upon arrival from China where they will be examined for up to one month for signs of the coronavirus.
articles.content:

articles.author: Michael Hollan
articles.title: Coronavirus prompts family to cancel vacation, they say Norwegian won't refund them thousands of dollars
articles.description: Vacations are supposed to be relaxing.
articles.content:
Vacations are supposed to be relaxing.
That’s the reason why one family is canceling their cruise vacation, which they booked a year ago, long before the coronavirus outbreak. Since the boat is scheduled to stop in Hong Kong, they decided that it was better … [+2036 chars]

articles.author: Danielle Wallace
articles.title: China deploys 1,400 military doctors, nurses to staff makeshift hospitals in Wuhan
articles.description: Following the first confirmed coronavirus death outside China, the country’s defense military on Sunday deployed 1,400 medical personnel to staff a new hospital in Wuhan, the epicenter of the outbreak of the novel virus that’s now killed more than 300 people …

articles.author: Dom Calicchio
articles.title: Coronavirus death in Philippines said to be first outside China
articles.description: A 44-year-old Chinese man visiting the Philippines is believed to be the first fatality outside China to be linked to the coronavirus, officials say.
articles.content:
A 44-year-old Chinese man visiting the Philippines is believed to be the first fatality outside China to be linked to the coronavirus, officials say.
